title: Type Designer
content:
One who designs [typefaces](http://web.archive.org/web/20131101065814/http:/typophile.com/wiki/typeface). Not to be confused with [Typographer](http://web.archive.org/web/20131101065814/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Typographer).

For a listing of type designers, see [Designers](http://web.archive.org/web/20131101065814/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Designers).
author: vinceconnare
